Body:
"""
        Test that a TypeError exception is raised when trying to rekey an
        object with an invalid offset.
        """
kwargs = {'offset': 'invalid'}
with ProxyKmipClient() as client:
    self.assertRaisesRegex(TypeError, 'The offset must be an integer.',
        client.rekey, **kwargs)
mock.patch('kmip.pie.client.KMIPProxy', mock.MagicMock(spec_set=KMIPProxy))
